title: Wanted - T206 (and 205) cards with great fronts

posts.post_title: Wanted - T206 (and 205) cards with great fronts
posts.post_content:
Want to buy 205 and 206 cards, particularly HOFers, with great fronts but technically downgraded due to back damage. See attached scan for an example.

 If you have cards that fit this description please PM me or email at [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] with what you have.

Thanks

Chris
